ygData.subject: Re: The worth of a Wizard (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: The rumor is that bloodstone rings double the healing rate for Warriors and warriors only, since they are the PURE melee class... Well we are the PURE magic
ygData.messageBody:
The rumor is that bloodstone rings double the healing rate for Warriors and
warriors only, since they are the PURE melee class... Well we are the PURE
magic class. We're the only ones that basically have no melee skills or no
pet to melee for us. Maybe a faster mana regen could be put in, but I like
the meditation idea better.
In a message dated 5/27/99 3:11:36 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Sean.Clark@... writes:

<< Max Meditation Skill - Don't bother, we already have a way to decrease our
downtime with meditation...anybody ever played a warrior? lol 20-30 MINUTES
of healing at high levels! >>
